data.title: China
data.meta_description: Explore how Sanofi collaborates with companies in China to address unique market needs across therapeutic areas and digital health

Strategic investment in Cathay Innovation to help us access the latest innovations in healthcare technologies in China.

Sanofi extended another 10 years of strategic collaboration with China Resources for EssentialeÂ®âs distribution & promotion. The partnership helps to access more consumers with high-quality products and services from both parties and build the leading consumer health brand.

Sanofi and Innovent Biologics have entered a strategic collaboration to bring innovative medicines to patients in China by leveraging the synergy between Sanofi and Innoventâs pipeline and R&D resources with the mutual aim to address major unmet medical needs for cancer patients.
